dcterms:description: A daily activity dataset for ubiquitous activity recognition using wearable sensors, collected from a special device, MotionNode, with a fixed sensing position.
dcterms:title: USC-HAD

dcterms:description: A complex dataset for heterogeneous human activity recognition, collected using various smart devices with different sampling rates and operating systems.
dcterms:title: HHAR
